Control Name: Uses Antivirus and Anti-Malware Software—Antivirus and anti-malware software is implemented and maintained to provide for the interception or detection and remediation of malware.

control_attributes.Control: Uses Antivirus and Anti-Malware Software—Antivirus and anti-malware software is implemented and maintained to provide for the interception or detection and remediation of malware.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.8 The entity implements controls to prevent or detect and act upon the introduction of unauthorized or malicious software to meet the entity’s objectives.
